DOC.brief_summary: This pre-post intervention pilot study evaluate impact 30-minute , 8-week mind-body/meditation intervention self-reported quality life individual employ Allina Health . Outcomes include validated questionnaire depressive symptomology , perceive stress , anxiety , healthy lifestyle , quality life well biological outcome salivary cortisol sub-sample employee .
